Name: NUI
About the game: NUI is a game about farewell, a minimalistic puzzle-platformer where a mysterious character carries a sword deeply tied to him. The sword must be taken to the end of the cave, while the sword limits the character movements, it can also be used as a powerful weapon. However, due to the bond with the sword distancing too much from it will damage you... A small puzzle-platformer with a minimalistic and touching story about farewell. Discover the way to carry your sword to the end of each screen Explore an ancient cave with 50 levels that mix platforming skills and puzzles More than 15 secrets scattered through the cave to be found Small Game: Main game can be completed in less than 1 hour NUI is a small passion project made in our free time, for that reason, it is meant to be a short and fun experience. Let us here your thoughts and suggestions about it! Contact us by any of the links available at www.davidandpixels.com Have fun playing it!
